entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
